short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expand GPTs' knowledge: Add webpages, PDFs etc to GPTs' memories anywhere, anytime.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Wisebase Knowledge Collector is an essential Chrome extension for ChatGPT and GPTs developers, streamlining the process of enhancing GPTs' intelligence. It provides a seamless way to capture and save diverse content types, like webpages and PDFs, directly into Wisebase.ai. This platform allows developers to construct a comprehensive knowledge base that directly feeds into their GPTs within OpenAI's GPTs framework. With this tool, the continuous aggregation of knowledge not only simplifies the updating process but also ensures the progressive enhancement of GPTs, making them increasingly smarter and more adept at handling complex tasks.
